name: MEC Nordique Mitts - Unisex
description:
Keep your paws warm when the temperature drops. Equipped with Primaloft Gold series insulation and waterproof-breathable inserts, these lightweight mitts keep your hands protected without making them sweaty.Primaloft Gold series insulation provides optimal breathability.Waterproof-breathable insert keeps out wetness.Back-of-hand heavy pile Sherpa fleece lining; palm side tricot fleece for softness.Pre-curved finger construction.Open-celled foam padding across the back of the knuckles for added durability.Easy-grip reinforced synthetic palm material is quick drying and has a leather-like durability, wet or dry.Removable keeper cord.One-handed gauntlet cinch.

        Sustainability
